description.english: Hit a long shot on the Moon level
description.german: Erfolgreicher Distanzwurf auf der Mond-Ebene
description.french: Réaliser un tir à distance dans le niveau de la Lune

description.schinese: 在月球关卡来一次远投
description.tchinese: 在月球關卡完成一次長距離射擊
description.russian: Сделайте дальний бросок и попадите в кольцо на Лунном уровне

description.english: Collect all orbs in the entire game
description.german: Sammle alle Sphären im gesamten Spiel
description.french: Récupérer tous les orbes dans l'intégralité du jeu
description.italian: Raccogli tutte le sfere dell'intero gioco

description.russian: Соберите все сферы во всей игре

description.swedish: Fånga alla klot i hela spelet
description.brazilian: Colete todos os orbes do jogo
description.latam: Recoge todas las esferas del juego.

description.english: Find all of the constellation objects hidden througout the game
description.german: Finde alle im Spiel versteckten Konstellationsobjekte
description.french: Trouver tous les objets de constellation dissimulés dans le jeu
description.italian: Trova tutti gli oggetti della costellazione nascosti nel gioco
description.koreana: 게임 내에 숨겨진 모든 별자리를 발견하십시오.
description.spanish: Recoge todos los objetos de constelaciones ocultos en el juego.
description.schinese: 找到藏在游戏各处的星座物品
description.tchinese: 找到藏在遊戲各處的星座物品
description.russian: Найдите все объекты-созвездия, спрятанные в игре
description.japanese: ゲーム中に隠された星座のオブジェクトをすべて見つける
description.swedish: Hitta alla konstellationer som är gömda i spelet
description.turkish: Oyun boyunca saklanmış bütün takımyıldızı objelerini bulun
description.brazilian: Encontre todos os objetos de constelações escondidos pelo jogo.
description.latam: Recoge todos los objetos de constelaciones ocultos en el juego.

description.english: Grab a drink
description.german: Nimm dir ein Getränk
description.french: Prendre une boisson
description.italian: Prendi una bibita
description.spanish: Tómate algo.
description.schinese: 拿住酒杯
description.tchinese: 拿一瓶飲料
description.russian: Возьмите напиток
description.japanese: ドリンクを手に取る
description.brazilian: Pegue uma bebida
description.latam: Toma un trago.

description.english: Fly through the gate on a leaf
description.german: Fliege auf einem Blatt durch das Tor
description.french: Voler à travers le portail sur une feuille
description.italian: Vola attraverso il cancello su una foglia
description.spanish: Vuela en una hoja a través de la puerta.
description.schinese: 乘着叶子穿过大门
description.tchinese: 飛過樹葉上的門
description.russian: Пролетите через ворота на листе
description.japanese: 葉っぱのゲートを飛び抜ける
description.brazilian: Voe pelo portão em uma folha
description.latam: Vuela en una hoja a través de la reja.

description.english: Bounce from the couch into the pool
description.german: Springe von der Couch in den Pool
description.french: Rebondir contre le canapé jusque dans la piscine
description.italian: Rimbalza dal divano dentro la piscina
description.spanish: Rebota desde el sofá hasta la piscina.
description.schinese: 从沙发跳进水塘
description.tchinese: 從沙發上跳入水池中
description.russian: Прыгните с дивана в бассейн
description.japanese: ソファーで飛び跳ねてプールに入る
description.swedish: Studsa från soffan ner i poolen
description.brazilian: Pule do sofá para a piscina
description.latam: Rebota del sillón a la piscina.

description.english: Hit all of the soda cans
description.german: Triff alle Getränkedosen
description.french: Toucher toutes les canettes de soda
description.italian: Colpisci tutte le lattine
description.spanish: Aciértales a todas las latas.
description.schinese: 砸中所有易拉罐
description.tchinese: 打中所有的易開罐
description.russian: Сбейте все банки
description.japanese: すべてのソーダ缶に命中させる
description.brazilian: Acerte todas as latas de refrigerante
description.latam: Aciértales a todas las latas.

description.english: Break out of the room in the first level
description.german: Brich aus dem Raum in der ersten Ebene aus
description.french: Sortir de la pièce du premier niveau
description.italian: Esci dalla stanza nel primo livello
description.spanish: Escapa de la habitación en el primer nivel.
description.schinese: 走出第一关的房间
description.tchinese: 逃出第一關的房間
description.russian: Выберитесь из комнаты на первом уровне
description.japanese: 第1ステージで部屋から出る
description.swedish: Ta dig ur rummet i början av spelet
description.brazilian: Escape da sala no primeiro nível
description.latam: Escapa de la habitación en el primer nivel.

description.english: Completed the game with a perfect score: all orbs collected and all constellations found
description.german: Schließe das Spiel mit perfekter Punktzahl ab: alle Sphären gesammelt und alle Konstellationen gefunden
description.french: Terminer le jeu avec un score parfait : tous les orbes collectés et toutes les constellations trouvées
description.italian: Completa il gioco con un punteggio perfetto, raccogliendo tutte le sfere e trovando ogni costellazione.
description.koreana: 모든 보주와 별자리를 획득하여, 게임을 완벽한 점수로 완료하십시오.
description.spanish: Has completado el juego con una puntuación perfecta. Has recogido todas las esferas y has encontrado todas las constelaciones.
description.schinese: 满分通关游戏，获得所有星球，找到所有星座
description.tchinese: 以完美的成績通關遊戲：收集到所有寶珠並找到所有星座。
description.russian: Завершите игру с максимальным результатом: все сферы собраны, все созвездия найдены
description.japanese: オーブをすべて集め、星座もすべて見つけ、完璧な状態でゲームをクリアする
description.swedish: Klara spelet med högsta poäng: fånga alla klot och hitta alla konstellationer
description.turkish: Oyunu mükemmel puanla bitirin: bütün küreler ve takımyıldızlarını bulun
description.brazilian: Concluiu o jogo com uma pontuação perfeita: todos os orbes coletados e todas as constelações encontradas
description.latam: Completaste el juego con puntaje perfecto: recogiste todas las esferas y hallaste todas las constelaciones.

description.english: Fly through the hole in the fence
description.german: Fliege durch das Loch im Zaun
description.french: Voler à travers le trou de la palissade
description.italian: Vola attraversa il buco nella staccionata
description.spanish: Vuela a través del agujero de la valla.
description.schinese: 穿过围墙的缝隙
description.tchinese: 飛過籬笆上的洞
description.russian: Пролетите через дырку в заборе
description.japanese: フェンスの穴を飛び抜ける
description.brazilian: Voe pelo buraco na cerca
description.latam: Vuela a través del espacio de la cerca.

displayName.french: Et un, et deux, et trois zéros !

description.english: Fly through all of the cereal rings
description.german: Fliege durch alle Cerealien-Ringe
description.french: Voler à travers tous les anneaux de céréales
description.italian: Vola attraverso gli anelli dei cereali
description.spanish: Vuela a través de los aros de cereal.
description.schinese: 穿过所有麦片圈
description.tchinese: 飛過所有早餐穀片的圈圈
description.russian: Пролетите через все колечки
description.japanese: シリアルリングを全てくぐる
description.brazilian: Voe por todos os anéis de cereais
description.latam: Vuela a través de los aros de cereal.

description.english: Full score in the blueberry basketball game
description.german: Volle Punktzahl im Blaubeeren-Basketball-Spiel
description.french: Réaliser un score parfait au jeu de basket-myrtilles
description.italian: Segna tutti i punti nel basket con mirtilli
description.koreana: 블루베리 농구 게임에서 모든 점수를 획득하십시오.
description.spanish: Anota todos los puntos en el baloncesto con arándanos.
description.schinese: 蓝莓投球游戏获得满分
description.tchinese: 在藍莓球遊戲中拿下滿分
description.russian: Наберите максимальный счет в черничном баскетболе

description.turkish: Yabanmersini basket oyununda tam skor yapın
description.brazilian: Atinja a pontuação máxima no jogo de basquete de mirtilos
description.latam: Anota todos los puntos en el baloncesto con arándanos.

description.english: Jump on all three mushrooms in a row
description.german: Springe hintereinander auf alle drei Pilze
description.french: Sauter sur trois champignons de suite
description.italian: Salta su tutti e tre i funghi in sequenza
description.koreana: 버섯 세 개 모두에서 연속으로 점프하십시오.
description.spanish: Salta las tres setas en secuencia.
description.schinese: 连续踩到三棵蘑菇
description.tchinese: 連續在3朵蘑菇上跳躍
description.russian: Запрыгните на все три гриба подряд
description.japanese: すべての3つのキノコの上を連続して飛び移る
description.swedish: Hoppa på alla tre svamparna i rad
description.turkish: Üç mantardan da arka arkaya zıplayın
description.brazilian: Pule em todos os três cogumelos em sequência
description.latam: Salta los tres hongos en secuencia.

description.english: Collect all orbs on the Food level
description.german: Sammle alle Sphären in der Essen-Ebene
description.french: Récupérer tous les orbes du niveau Nourriture

description.spanish: Recoge todas las esferas del nivel de comida.
